title: OMC-JSON Schema v2.6
$comment:
Copyright 2021-2024 Motion Picture Laboratories, Inc.
SPDX-License-Identifier: APACHE-2.0

Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description: A physical or digital object or collection of objects specific to the creation of the Creative Work.

Asset.title: Asset Group
Asset.description: The set of Assets that make up an an asset group and has a structuralType of 'assetGroup'

version.title: Asset Version Information
version.description: A particular form, variant, or representation of an Asset that differs in some way from its source Asset.

audioChannelName.title: Audio Channel Name
audioChannelName.description: A formalization of the name of the loudspeaker the Audio Channel in intended to drive.

audioMixType.title: Audio Mix Type
audioMixType.description: A description of the type or use for this mix.

audioProcessingAction.title: Audio Processing Action
audioProcessingAction.description: Indication of what was done to the audio in an Audio Session.

audioTrackName.title: Audio Track Name
audioTrackName.description: Further differentiation for the Audio Track.

cameraMetadata.title: Camera Metadata
cameraMetadata.description: Capture-specific details and information about the Camera itself.

activeSensorPhysicalDimensions.title: Active Sensor Physical Dimensions
activeSensorPhysicalDimensions.description: Height and width of the active area of the camera sensor

cameraFirmwareVersion.title: Camera Firmware Version
cameraFirmwareVersion.description: An alphanumeric code that identifies the firmware installed in the camera at the time of recording

cameraLabel.title: Camera Label
cameraLabel.description: Human readable ID assigned to each production camera.

cameraMake.title: Camera Make
cameraMake.description: The manufacturer or vendor of the camera.

cameraModel.title: Camera Model
cameraModel.description: The manufacturer's name for the camera model. For example, the name of the camera family followed by the name of the variant.

cameraRoll.title: Camera Roll
cameraRoll.description: Identifier for a group of events captured together on the same camera and recording media.

cameraSerialNumber.title: Camera Serial Number
cameraSerialNumber.description: An alphanumeric code assigned by the manufacturer to a camera.

cameraUID.title: Camera UID
cameraUID.description: An alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies the camera among all cameras from all vendors.

captureRate.title: Capture Rate
captureRate.description: The number of individual images captured per second.

circleTake.title: Circle Take
circleTake.description: Indicating whether a recorded sequence of images is considered a candidate for use.

exposureIndex.title: Exposure Index
exposureIndex.description: Exposure index is the ISO rating used to determine exposure when the recording was made.

fdlLink.title: FDL Link
fdlLink.description: Unique identifier of the FDL used by the camera

flipX.title: Flip - X
flipX.description: The flip-X factor indicates whether the image is flipped horizontally.

flipY.title: Flip - Y
flipY.description: The flip-Y factor indicates whether the image is flipped vertically.

frameHeight.title: Frame Height
frameHeight.description: The height of the intended image in pixels. This may or may not be the height of the recorded image or the sensor

frameWidth.title: Frame Width
frameWidth.description: The width of the intended image in pixels. This may or may not be the width of the recorded image or the sensor

isoSpeed.title: ISO Speed
isoSpeed.description: Arithmetic ISO scale as defined in ISO 12232

lutUID.title: LUT UID
lutUID.description: An alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies the LUT loaded into the camera and applied to the monitor output during shooting.

pixelAspectRatio.title: Pixel Aspect Ratio
pixelAspectRatio.description: Describes how the pixels are to be interpreted to correctly display the image.

playbackRate.title: Playback Rate
playbackRate.description: The number of individual images per second of the intended playback speed.

reelName.title: Reel Name
reelName.description: A name assigned to a sequence of recorded images

roll.title: Roll (Dutch)
roll.description: The angle of the camera off of the roll axis, measured in degrees when the camera is level.

shutterAngle.title: Shutter Angle
shutterAngle.description: A measure of the exposure time of an image relative to the frame rate. 0 < shutter angle <= 360.

tilt.title: Tilt
tilt.description: The angle of a camera off its pitch axis, measured in degrees when the camera is level.

timecode.title: Timecode
timecode.description: A linear sequence of numeric codes generated at a regular interview and usually recorded in the format: <hour>:<minute>:<second>:<frame>.

tint.title: Tint
tint.description: Defines the R/B white points against the green channel.

whiteBalance.title: White Balance
whiteBalance.description: The color temperature of white expressed in degrees Kelvin.

isSelfContained.title: Is Self Contained
isSelfContained.description: Indicates the Asset does not depend on other Assets to perform its functional use.

lensMetadata.title: Lens Metadata
lensMetadata.description: Capture-specific details and information about the Lens itself.

anamorphicSqueeze.title: Anamorphic Squeeze
anamorphicSqueeze.description: Nominal ratio of height to width of the image of an axis-aligned square captured by the camera sensor

fStop.title: F-Stop
fStop.description: The linear f-number of the lens, equal to the focal length divided by the diameter of the entrance pupil.

focalLength.title: Focal Length
focalLength.description: The actual focal length of the lens, in millimeters, when the image was captured. With a zoom lens this may be change frame by frame.

lensFirmwareVersion.title: Lens Firmware Version
lensFirmwareVersion.description: Version identifier for the firmware of the lens

lensModel.title: Lens Model
lensModel.description: The lens model identifier assigned by the lens manufacturer or vendor

lensSerialNumber.title: Lens Serial Number
lensSerialNumber.description: A number unique to each lens from the same manufacturer or vendor and of the same model.

tStop.title: T-Stop
tStop.description: The linear T-number of the lens, equal to the f-number of the lens divided by the square root of the transmittance of the lens.

mapFormat.title: Map Format
mapFormat.description: The data layout of a Map.

mapType.title: Map Type
mapType.description: Guidance about the intended use of a Map in a Material.

recorderMetadata.title: Recorder Metadata
recorderMetadata.description: Information about a Recorder and the recording media.

recorderFirmwareVersion.title: Recorder Firmware Version
recorderFirmwareVersion.description: An alphanumeric code that identifies the firmware installed in the recorder at the time of recording.

recorderModel.title: Recorder Model
recorderModel.description: The recorder model identifier assigned by the lens manufacturer or vendor.

recorderSerialNumber.title: Recorder Serial Number
recorderSerialNumber.description: A number unique to each recorder from the same manufacturer or vendor and of the same model.

storageMediaUID.title: Storage Media UID
storageMediaUID.description: An alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies the storage media (i.e., mag) the footage was recorded on to.

AssetSC.title: Asset Structural Characteristics
AssetSC.description: Describes the form of an Asset along with the attributes specific to that assetâ€™s form.

Carrier.title: Carrier
Carrier.description: For describing the physical storage device on which the digital essence is stored.

isAnalog.title: Is Analog
isAnalog.description: True if the Asset is an Analog Asset.

structuralProperties.title: Structural Properties
structuralProperties.description: A set of properties that describe the asset in this form.

structuralType.title: Structural Type
structuralType.description: A cannonical description of the the assets form.

version.title: Asset Structural Version Information
version.description: A particular form, variant, or representation of an Asset that differs in some way from its source Asset.

audioBitRate.title: Audio Bit Rate
audioBitRate.description: The number of bits in one second of sampled audio, expressed in Kbits per second.

audioSampleRate.title: Audio Sample Rate
audioSampleRate.description: The average number of samples per second taken from the source audio input in KHz.

audioSampleSize.title: Audio Sample Size
audioSampleSize.description: The number of bits per audio sample.

fileDetails.title: File Details
fileDetails.description: Where opaque identifiers are used it can be useful to express naming for use in traditional file systems

geometryType.title: Geometry Type
geometryType.description: A description of the general underlying form of a three-dimensional shape.

linkset.title: Linkset
linkset.description: When used with resolution system returning a linkset additional information can help disambiguate multiple linksets in the response.

Infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
Infrastructure.description: The underlying systems and framework required for the production of the Creative Work; it is generally not specific to a particular Creative Work.

InfrastructureSC.title: Infrastructure Structural Characteristics
InfrastructureSC.description: Describes the form of the Infrastructure along with the attributes specific to that infrastructure's form

structuralProperties.title: Structural Properties
structuralProperties.description: A set of properties that describe the infrastructure in this form

structuralType.title: Structural Type
structuralType.description: A structured description of the the Infrastructures form

infrastructureFC.title: Infrastructure Functional Characteristics
infrastructureFC.description: Describes the use or purpose of an Infrastructure within the production process

functionalProperties.title: Functional Properties
functionalProperties.description: A set of properties that describe the tasks functional use

functionalType.title: Functional Type
functionalType.description: The use or purpose of a Task within the production process.

Character.title: Character
Character.description: A sentient entity (usually a person but not always) in the script whose specific identity is consequential to the narrative. A Character is generally identified by a specific name.

characterType.title: characterType
characterType.description: Describes the specific type of Character, equivalent to the sub-class used in OMC-RDF.

background.title: background
background.description: Additional annotations on a characters background

oneOf.$comment: This should use the annotation property

physicalCharacteristics.title: Physical Characteristics
physicalCharacteristics.description: Allows for the the description of certain physical characteristics on a character, things that might be useful to an art department, wardrobe or casting for example.

eyeColor.title: Eye Color
eyeColor.description: The color of the characters eyes.

hairColor.title: Hair Color
hairColor.description: The hair color of the character

hairLength.title: Hair Length
hairLength.description: The length of hair of the character.

species.title: Species
species.description: A species to which this character belongs

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Used to indicate a number of 'extra' characters when required.

Context.title: Context
Context.description: Informs scope within the construction process of a Creative Work.

For.title: Context For
For.description: The entities for which this Context is applicable
For.$comment: Use 'ForEntity' to avoid confusion with the relationship property 'for'

ForEntity.title: Context For
ForEntity.description: The entities for which this Context is applicable.

contextCategory.title: Context Category
contextCategory.description: Provides an additional level of categorization of the Context beyond it's type.
contextCategory.$comment: Currently considered Beta and only adopted in OMC-JSON

contextType.title: Context Type
contextType.description: A classification of the type of context represented

title.title: Creative Work Title
title.description: A name for a Creative Work.
title.$comment: Deprecated in favor of 'creativeWorkTitle', with improved functionality

internalTitle.title: Creative Work Internal Title
internalTitle.description: The internal title of the work

officialTitle.title: Creative Work Official Title
officialTitle.description: The official title of the work

workingTitle.title: Creative Work Working Title
workingTitle.description: The working title of the work

Episode.title: Episode
Episode.description: Episodes that belong to this Series or Season described by the instance Creative Work

ProductionCompany.title: Production Company
ProductionCompany.description: The Production companies responsible for the production of this Creative Work

Season.title: Season
Season.description: Seasons to which this instance of Episode belongs, or that are part are part of this instance of Series.

Series.title: Series
Series.description: Series to which this Creative Work belongs

countryOfOrigin.title: Country Of Origin
countryOfOrigin.description: The home country of the companies that had primary creative control of the creation of the Creative Work, generally the producers.

creativeWorkCategory.title: Creative Work Category
creativeWorkCategory.description: The type or form of a Creative Work.

distributionNumber.title: Distribution Number
distributionNumber.description: The position number of the Episode within its parent Season (or parent Series, if the Episode is directly in a Series) during initial broadcast or distribution.

houseSequence.title: House Sequence
houseSequence.description: The internal Episode number assigned by the producer or commissioning broadcaster.

originalLanguage.title: Original Languages
originalLanguage.description: The language of languages spoken in the creative work.

Depiction.title: Depiction
Depiction.description: The representation of something from a narrative entity by a production entity in the Creative Work, specified or implied by the Script.

Depictor.$comment: Deprecated in favor of Depicter, corrects spelling inconsistancy with core ontology

depictionType.title: Object type
depictionType.description: A categorization of the type of depiction

Effect.title: Effect
Effect.description: An on screen visual effect considered essential to the narrative.

effectType.title: effectType
effectType.description: A categorization of the type of effect.

NarrativeAudio.title: Narrative Audio
NarrativeAudio.description: A named piece of audio significant to the narrative.

narrativeType.title: Narrative Type (narrative audio)
narrativeType.description: Describes the specific type of Narrative Audio, equivalent to the sub-class used in OMC-RDF.

NarrativeLocation.title: Narrative Location
NarrativeLocation.description: A location specified or implied by the narrative.

narrativeType.title: narrativeType - narrative location
narrativeType.description: Describes the specific type of Narrative Location, equivalent to the sub-class used in OMC-RDF.

NarrativeObject.title: Narrative Object
NarrativeObject.description: A named object related to or interacting with characters that is implied or understood to be necessary for the narrative. Includes items like props, wardrobe, set dressing and vehicles.

narrativeType.title: narrativeType - narrative object
narrativeType.description: Describes the specific type of Narrative Object, equivalent to the sub-class used in OMC-RDF.

NarrativeScene.title: Narrative Scene
NarrativeScene.description: Taken from the narrative itself and traditionally defined by creative intent and typically a unity of time, place, action, or theme.

narrativeType.title: narrativeType - narrative scene
narrativeType.description: Describes the specific type of Narrative Scene, equivalent to the sub-class used in OMC-RDF.

sceneName.title: Narrative Scene Name
sceneName.description: A human readable name for the scene

altName.title: Scene alternate name
altName.description: An alternate, often shorter, name used in applications to identify the scenes.

fullName.title: Scene full name
fullName.description: A full descriptive name for the scene

sceneNumber.title: Scene Number
sceneNumber.description: A number used in the script to refer to the scene

slugline.title: Slugline
slugline.description: A note describing the slugline or seperate parts of the slugline

NarrativeStyling.title: Narrative Styling
NarrativeStyling.description: Styling required to prepare an actor for their role.

narrativeType.title: narrativeType - narrative styling
narrativeType.description: Describes the specific type of Narrative Styling, equivalent to the sub-class used in OMC-RDF.

NarrativeWardrobe.title: Narrative Wardrobe
NarrativeWardrobe.description: The clothing for a Character in the narrative.

narrativeType.title: narrativeType - narrative wardrobe
narrativeType.description: Describes the specific type of Narrative Wardrobe, equivalent to the sub-class used in OMC-RDF.

ProductionLocation.title: Production Location
ProductionLocation.description: A real place that is used to depict the Narrative Location or used for creating the production.

locationType.description: Describes whether this is production location or more specifically a shooting location

ProductionScene.title: Production Scene
ProductionScene.description: Defined either by explicit divisions in the structure of the Script, e.g., by a Slugline, or by additional capture for use in the Creative Work that is not tied to any particular Scene in the Script.

sceneDescriptor.title: Scene Descriptor
sceneDescriptor.description: An alphanumeric reference to a Production Scene.

sceneHeader.title: Scene Header
sceneHeader.description: Used when referring to the Production Scene. It is generally synonymous with Slugline and is used to divide a Script into scenes.

sceneNumber.title: Scene Number
sceneNumber.description: A number tied to a Slugline when a Script is locked

Sequence.title: Sequence
Sequence.description: A sequence of shots linked to creative intent.
Sequence.$comment: Deprecated because Sequence is now part of Composition

version.title: Sequence Version Information
version.description: A particular form, variant, or representation of an Asset that differs in some way from its source Asset.

description.title: Asset description
description.description: A human readable description of the version

name.title: A name for this specific version of the Asset

versionNumber.title: Version Number
versionNumber.description: A designation indicating a place in a sequence of versions

Slate.title: Slate
Slate.description: Used to capture key identifying information about what is being recorded on any given setup and take.

cameraLabel.title: Camera Label
cameraLabel.description: Label for the Camera responsible for the Capture, usually related to the role and responsibility of the group operating it and usually a single upper-case letter starting with A.

cameraRoll.title: Camera Roll
cameraRoll.description: Identifier for a group of events captured together on the same camera on the same media.

cameraUnit.title: Camera Unit
cameraUnit.description: A group of Participants responsible for shooting some element of a Scene, e.g., a Main Unit or Second Unit.

recordingFPS.title: Recording FPS
recordingFPS.description: Frames per second recorded by the camera.

shootDate.title: Shoot Date
shootDate.description: The date of capture or creation

shootDay.title: Shoot Day
shootDay.description: The number of the day on the shooting schedule.

soundRoll.title: Sound Roll
soundRoll.description: Identifier for a group of audio events captured together on the same recording device and same media.

SpecialAction.title: Special Action
SpecialAction.description: An action or set of actions that are performed and require additional choreography or supervision.

oneOf.title: Entity Type
oneOf.$comment: Deprecated in favor of SpecialAction, correcting a bug in the release

specialActionType.title: specialActionType
specialActionType.description: A categorization of the type action.

Department.title: Department
Department.description: Part of a larger Organization with a particular set of responsibilities on the production.

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: A legal entity or groups of people associated with the production.. with a particular purpose relative to the production.

Participant.title: Participant
Participant.description: The entities (people, organizations, and services) that are responsible for the production of the Creative Work.

Participant.title: Participant Group
Participant.description: Any Participants that are members of this Participant group

ParticipantSC.title: Participant Structural Characteristics
ParticipantSC.description: Describes the form of a Participant along with the attributes specific to that Participantâ€™s form.

contact.title: Participant Contact
contact.$comment: Contact should be on the Participants structural characteristics

participantFC.title: Participant Functional Characteristics
participantFC.description: The use or purpose of a Participant within the production process

Role.title: Role
Role.description: The combination of a Task and the Participant responsible for it.

jobTitle.title: Job Title
jobTitle.description: A formal name for the position a Person holds in relation to the production, usually associated with a specific set of responsibilities.

Person.title: Person
Person.description: People are the individuals that are associated with the production

jobTitle.title: Person's Job Title
jobTitle.description: A persons job title (as distinct from a specific role).

personName.title: Person's Name
personName.description: The canonical name or set of names and titles for the Person

Role.title: Role
Role.description: A set of properties that define the role of a participant within the production

roleType.title: Role Type
roleType.description: The specific role, typically used in authorization systems
roleType.$comment: A set of controlled values is planned for a future release

Service.title: Service
Service.description: A computer driven agent that can perform tasks given the proper context and structured data.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: A piece of work to be done and completed as a step in the production process.

TaskSC.title: Task Structural Characteristics
TaskSC.description: Describes the form of Task along with the attributes specific to that taskâ€™s form

structuralProperties.title: Structural Properties
structuralProperties.description: A set of properties that describe the Task in this form

structuralType.title: Task Structural Type
structuralType.description: A structured description of the the Tasks form

taskFC.title: Task Functional Characteristics
taskFC.description: Describes the purpose of the Task within the production process

functionalProperties.title: Functional Properties
functionalProperties.description: A set of properties that describe the tasks functional use

functionalType.title: Functional Type
functionalType.description: The use or purpose of a Task within the production process.

Utility.title: Utility Definitions
Utility.description: Common data models and data structures used in multiple places and in multiple ways in a larger system.

Composition.title: Composition
Composition.description: A set of Assets or other Compositions that can be combined to produce a new Asset.

Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description: A set of Assets that are included in this Composition.

AssetSC.title: Asset Structural Characteristics
AssetSC.description: A set of Asset Structural Characteristics that are included in this Composition.

Composition.title: Composition Group
Composition.description: The set of Compositions that are included in this Composition.

StartHere.title: Start Here
StartHere.description: Start point for assembling the Composition, the Asset that contains the instructions for the Composition.

compositionType.title: Composition Type
compositionType.description: The type, or sub-class, that this specific Composition represents.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: A particular place or position either in either the real world or the narrative world.

address.title: Address
address.description: A postal address or identifiable location of a place or building

locality.title: Address locality
locality.description: The locality in which the street address is, and which is in the region.

region.title: Address region
region.description: The region in which the locality is, and which is in the country.

annotation.title: Annotation
annotation.description: Human readable commentary, explanation, or information.

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for the note or annotation.

author.title: Author
author.description: Who wrote or added this annotation.

text.title: Text
text.description: The text of the note or annotation.

audioContent.title: Audio Content Information
audioContent.description: Identification of the content type in a particular Audio Asset.

mcaContent.title: MCA Content
mcaContent.description: Indicates the nature of the content.

mcaContentSubtype.description: Granular indication of the nature of the content if required.

basicName.title: Basic Name
basicName.description: A canonical name and alternative name for the entity.

altName.title: Alternate Name
altName.description: An alternate, often shortened name for the entity.

fullName.title: Full Name
fullName.description: The full an complete name of the entity.

boundingBox.title: Bounding Box
boundingBox.description: The minimum axis-aligned right rectangular prism in the local space of the Geometry that fully encloses the Geometry.

codec.title: Codec
codec.description: The specific codec used to encode the Asset.

completeName.title: Complete Name
completeName.description: A detailed description of a person, or others, name and variants of their name.

alias.title: Alias
alias.description: An alias being used by a person often used to disguise someones real identity, sometimes used when booking hotel rooms or restaurants.

birthName.title: Birth Name
birthName.description: A persons name at birth, also referred to as maiden name.

familyName.title: Family Name
familyName.description: A persons family name, also referred to as surname.

firstGivenName.title: First Given Name
firstGivenName.description: A person's first name, also referred to as given name.

fullName.title: Full Name
fullName.description: A complete name, typically a conjunction of familyName, firstGivenName and possibly other fields.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: A prefix that can indicate a persons gender or title

primaryName.title: Primary Name
primaryName.description: A persons primary name, one they typically use, also often a combination of first, second and family name.

secondGivenName.title: Second Given Name
secondGivenName.description: A persons second given name, also referred to as middle name.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: A suffix, often used to indicate a title or classification

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Means by which the subject of an entity may be contacted in the production.

coordinateOrientation.title: Coordinate Orientation
coordinateOrientation.description: The direction and handedness of the axes used in the geometry.

coordinates.title: Coordinates
coordinates.description: A global positioning coordinate in compliance with WGS 84

customData.title: Custom Data
customData.description: A user defined set of custom data in the payload of the instance, used where the formal schema lacks required properties.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: A person, or others, expressed or preferred gender and pronoun.

gender.title: Identifies as gender
gender.description: The gender by which an individual identifies

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: An identifier uniquely identifies an entity within a particular scope.

combinedForm.title: Identifier Combined Form
combinedForm.description: A combination of the Identifier Scope and Value that is useful for utilizing the identifier in a system.

identifierScope.title: Identifier Scope
identifierScope.description: The universe within which an identifier is valid and unique.

identifierValue.title: Identifier Value
identifierValue.description: A string of characters that uniquely identifies an object within a particular scope.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL or IRI that can be used for resolving the Identifier Value within the Identifier Scope.

levelOfDetail.title: Level of Detail
levelOfDetail.description: Percentage of the screen that an object can reasonably take up.

materialType.title: Material Type
materialType.description: Data values and relationships required to describe the look of a CG Asset.

provenance.title: Provenance
provenance.description: A record of when something was changed and by whom.

purpose.title: Purpose (Geometry)
purpose.description: A suggested or intended use for the object in a pipeline.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: The number of â€œrealâ€ units represented by a single unit in the coordinate space of the Geometry.

soundfield.title: Soundfield
soundfield.description: The acoustical space created by simultaneously reproducing one or more Audio Channels.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: A short string from a particular set, used for categorization and description

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: An indication of the set or system in which the tag values are relevant or defined.

value.title: Value
value.description: A set of tags taken from the domain.

date.title: Date
date.description: Should be formatted to comply with ISO 8601

dateTime.title: Date & Time
dateTime.description: Should be formatted to comply with ISO 8601

eventInTime.title: Event in Time
eventInTime.description: Describes a specific event that occurred

durationTime.title: Duration of Time
durationTime.description: Should be formatted to comply with ISO 8601

timecode.title: SMPTE Timecode
timecode.description:
SMPTE Timecode in the format HH:MM:SS:FF. 
Assumes the frame rate is 23.98, 24, 25, 29.97 NDF, or 30

dimensions.title: dimensions
dimensions.description: Encode a set of measurements to describe a 2 or 3 dimensional object (metric, imperial or pixels)

depth.description: The depth or Z axis of the object

oneOf.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millimeter
Encode distance using the imperial system of measurement (miles, feet, inches)
Encode a measurement of the number of pixels, typically in a digital image

height.description: The height or X axis of the object

oneOf.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millimeter
Encode distance using the imperial system of measurement (miles, feet, inches)
Encode a measurement of the number of pixels, typically in a digital image

width.description: The width or X axis of the object

oneOf.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millimeter
Encode distance using the imperial system of measurement (miles, feet, inches)
Encode a measurement of the number of pixels, typically in a digital image

linearDistance.title: Linear Distance
linearDistance.description: Encode a measurement of distance using the imperial or metric system

oneOf.description: Encode distance using the metric system of measurement (kilometer, meter, centimetre, millimeter
Encode distance using the imperial system of measurement (miles, feet, inches)

weight.title: weight
weight.description: Encode a measurement of weight using the imperial or metric system

oneOf.description: Encode weight using the metric system of measurement (kilogram, gram)
Encode weight using the imperial system of measurement (pounds, ounces)

core.title: Core
core.description: Sub-schemas used in building the schema that are not intrinsically part of the OMC spec.

description.title: Description
description.description: A brief description of the entity, primarily for human consumption.

entityInfo.title: Entity Information
entityInfo.description: Reserved for future use to describe specific details about the instance of the entity

instanceInfo.title: Instance Information
instanceInfo.description: Properties that describe information about this particular instance of an entity.
instanceInfo.$comment: Currently specific to the OMC-JSON implementation and should be considered Beta

name.title: Name
name.description: A name for the entity, this is primarily for human consumption in things like user interfaces. It should not be considered a canonical name.

schemaVersion.title: Schema Version
schemaVersion.description: Describes the version of OMC-JSON schema that was used to create this instance.

baseVersion.title: Version Information
baseVersion.description: The base properties that describe a version of something (Asset or Composition).

description.title: Asset description
description.description: A human readable description of the version

name.title: A name for this specific version of the Asset

versionNumber.title: Version Number
versionNumber.description: A designation indicating a place in a sequence of versions

reference.title: Reference entity
reference.description: An identifier that references another entity in the graph
